#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int arr[500001],st[4*500001];
int _gcd(int n,int m){return m==0?n:_gcd(m,n%m);}
void buildst(int idx,int ss,int se)
{
	if(ss==se)
	{
		//printf("a%d",ss);
		st[idx]=arr[ss];
	//	cout<<arr[ss]<<idx<<" ";
		return;
		
	}
	int mid=(ss+se)/2;
	buildst(2*idx,ss,mid);
	buildst(2*idx+1,mid+1,se);
	st[idx]=_gcd(st[2*idx],st[2*idx+1]);
}
int query(int idx,int ss,int se,int l,int r)
{
	if(l>r||r<ss||l>se)
	return 0;
	if(l<=ss&&r>=se)
	return st[idx];
	int mid=(ss+se)/2;

	int leftans=query(2*idx,ss,mid,l,r);
	int rightans=query(2*idx+1,mid+1,se,l,r);
		//cout<<leftans<<" l"<<rightans;
	return _gcd(leftans,rightans);
	
}
int main()
{
int n,k;
cin>>n>>k;
int i,j;
for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
cin>>arr[i];
//for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
//cout<<arr[i];
buildst(1,1,n);

int right=1,maxval=0;
for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
{
	for(j=right;j<=n;j++)
	{
		//cout<<i<<" "<<j;
		if(query(1,1,n,i,j)>=k)
		{
		//	cout<<right<<" ";
			right=j+1;
			maxval=max(maxval,(j-i+1));
		}
		else
		break;
	}
}	
cout<<maxval;
}
